      • addSteppables

        public void addSteppables()
        This method is called during the start phase of the simulation. The command: schedule.scheduleRepeating(Schedule.EPOCH, 0, this.scenarioManager, 2); is always executed in the first place. In this method, for example, the steppable responsible of print graphics can be added.
